channel.title: Nico Less
channel.description: I write about things I do, albums I like and thoughts I have. It’s like a social media feed, but slow and quiet.

item.title: loscil — Lake Fire
item.description: The latest album by loscil, Lake Fire, was released on May 2, 2025, and I finally took the time to listen to it. For a good reason. Because who could be more fitting for the very first post on this blog?

item.title: Sadie Powers — Souvenir
item.description: Sadie Powers combines vivid soundscapes with her main instrument, the bass, creating a mood that draws the listener deep in thought. The sad personal story behind the album (as described on her Bandcamp page) becomes audible.
